thread.title: BRIEF-Alnylam Receives European Medicines Agency Prime Designation For Accelerated Assessment Of Lumasiran

title: BRIEF-Alnylam Receives European Medicines Agency Prime Designation For Accelerated Assessment Of Lumasiran

organizations.name: accelerated assessment of lumasiran reuters staff

text: 22 AM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Alnylam Receives European Medicines Agency Prime Designation For Accelerated Assessment Of Lumasiran Reuters Staff 1 Min Read   Alnylam Pharmaceuticals Inc: * ALNYLAM RECEIVES EUROPEAN MEDICINES AGENCY PRIME DESIGNATION FOR ACCELERATED ASSESSMENT OF LUMASIRAN, AN INVESTIGATIONAL RNAI THERAPEUTIC FOR THE TREATMENT OF PRIMARY HYPEROXALURIA TYPE 1 (PH1) * ALNYLAM PHARMACEUTICALS INC - COMPANY INTENDS TO ADVANCE LUMASIRAN TO A PHASE 3 STUDY IN LATE 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
